title.narrative: Strategy for investment in fisheries in East Timor

description.narrative: The fisheries and aquaculture sectors in East Timor currently fall well short of their potential to substantially improve livelihoods and food security. Rudimentary aquaculture facilities exist but the sector as a whole is largely undeveloped. This small project, one of a suite of WorldFish projects, has the following objectives: to further refine aquaculture policy and implementation plans; to map aquaculture potential and fishery dependence; to identify priorities and develop implementation plans for key components of small-scale fisheries policy; to produce a plan for future research and development investment in the fishery and aquaculture sectors in East Timor. (FIS/2011/068)
